definition.name: Textarea
definition.purpose: Reusable styled textarea input for forms
definition.description: A React component that renders a styled <textarea> element with consistent design, supporting all standard textarea props and custom class names. It is intended for use in forms and user input areas throughout the application.

properties.description: All standard textarea props from React plus an optional className

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the textarea

visible: A textarea input field with default styling
enabled: User can type into the textarea unless disabled

effects: The textarea value updates as the user types
User cannot interact with the textarea
Textarea border and ring color change to indicate error

definition.visualLayout: A full-width, rounded, styled textarea with padding, border, and focus/invalid/disabled states.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses a utility function 'cn' for class name merging. Accepts all standard textarea props via React.ComponentProps<'textarea'>.
